column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Save Your Self from the Hell
#Text=Many people living on this planet do n't care about the afterlife although their Religion tells them sinners will be damned in Hell .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Choosing Your Belief
#Text=Think about your current belief .
#Text=Have you ever thought about your current belief ?
#Text=Is there evidence to prove your belief ?
#Text=You must think more about what you believe and if your belief is backed by evidence , logic and reason .
#Text=Keep in mind that many Religious leaders will lie to you and prevent you from thinking for yourself .
#Text=Focus on this life , rather than what happens after it .
#Text=Do n't fear the reaction of the people around you .
#Text=If you have to live in another place to follow the belief you 're certain it 's right then change it ! Put in mind that your unlimited life depends on your belief .
#Text=Choose a new belief .
#Text=If you thought about your belief , compared it to other religions and found it was wrong or found that there was better believes then you should follow it !
#Text=Learn what sins are deemed as " Unforgivable " in different religions , so that you may try to avoid them , should you ultimately choose a particular faith .
#Text=Eg : In Christianity , Blasphemy against the Holy Spirit is unforgivable ; In Islam , worshipping idols is unforgivable ; In Judaism , taking the Lord 's Name in vain is unforgivable .
#Text=After Choosing a Belief
#Text=Be a good person .
#Text=Have good personality , do good things and follow great morals like truthfulness , honesty and loyalty .
#Text=Make yourself an example of the good human .
#Text=Put in mind that you make your personality by your choices .
#Text=Put in mind that your choices will make your predestination .
#Text=Have a successful life .
#Text=Our god created us to benefit the whole humanity .
#Text=If you are a student study hard and try to be the best student .
#Text=If you are an employee work hard and try to be the best employee .
#Text=If you are a sportsman try to be the best in your field .
#Text=Whatever your work was try to be the best to benefit yourself and people around you .
#Text=Do all of that to get the prize from your god not from people around you .
#Text=Pray .
#Text=Ask your god to light your life .
#Text=If you want to have a good pray believe that your god listens every word you say .
#Text=Ask your god to forgive you .
#Text=Ask him to solve your problems .
#Text=Ask him to make you live in paradise after your death .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Pray and meditate constantly .
#Text=Prayer and meditation is the first step towards choosing Heaven , in the afterlife .
#Text=Have a healthy respect for human life on Earth .
#Text=Obey the Commandment , " Thou shalt not kill .
